title: Antidote to Common Poisons
content:
The Antidote to Common Poisons (or Antidote for Common Poisons) was a potion and antidote which counteracted ordinary poisons, such as creature bites and stings.[3] Its ingredients included bezoars, Standard Ingredient, ground unicorn horn and mistletoe berries.[2] The recipe for this potion could be found in Magical Drafts and Potions.[1]

During the 1986â€“1987 school year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Professor Severus Snape taught his third-year Potions students how to concoct this particular brew.[2]

The Potions Club used a slightly different potion formula, that included Honeywater, mint sprigs, stewed Mandrake, and essence of Lavender.[4]
